alert.note: Alert for Coahoma; Panola; Quitman; Tallahatchie; Tate; Tunica; Yalobusha (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 29 at 9:20AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Yalobusha, southeastern Coahoma, southeastern Tunica, southwestern Tate, northern Tallahatchie, Quitman and western Panola Counties through 945 AM CST... At 920 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dublin, or 9 miles southeast of Clarksdale, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clarksdale, Batesville, George Payne State Park, Tutwiler, Marks, Lambert, Jonestown, Crenshaw, Crowder, Sledge, Pope, Belen, Enid, Dublin, Pleasant Grove, Curtis Station, Vance, Darling, Courtland and Lyon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coahoma; Panola; Quitman; Tallahatchie; Tate; Tunica; Yalobusha
